page.title: 08 THE SUPERNATURAL
page.content: The Fillols held Old Hall for 200 years up until 1720 and the house is said to be haunted by old Filo whose body is buried under a pew belonging to the mansion in the local church at Rayne. Mr.Sexton,the present owner has seen no evidence of the supernatural at Old Hall but knows that a previous owner committed suicide by slitting his throat in an upstairs room. An Ex_employee of Old Hall was one day washing up in the kitchen with a small dog beside her. The dog started shaking and barking. This made her turn round. She saw what she described as "a willowey shape" in front of the door. It quickly vanished. It was at then that she decided to give up her job and return to her previous employment....working in an office.
